version_description:
— Lens correction tool,
— Various bug fixes and improvements.

— Zooming in currently edited face part (could be disabled in settings).
— Bug fixes and stability improvements.

— Select faces on group photos,
— Lips enhancement tool,
— Bug fixes and stability improvements.

— New background blur styles.
— Opening photo from share menu.
— Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Introducing AI-adjustments.
Make photos look awesome in a single tap!
BIG NEWS: The AUTO CORRECTION is here. It automates editing for you. Just hit a button and… BOOM — get an awesome result! Try out now.

-Wow! Eyebags new tool, try it!
-Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Introducing Internal Gallery!

— Copy/Paste adjustments between your photos.
— Back to editing any time, all edits are saved automatically.
— Easily organize your selfie collection.

-Amazing new look of your photos with unique Lensa photo filters!
-Bug fixes and stability improvement.

-Try new free instruments to make your selfies better;
-Bug fixes and stability improvement;

-Try new free instruments to make your selfies better;
-Bug fixes and stability improvement;

Introducing Video Retouching
Lensa now works with videos too! Retouch video selfies and share on Instagram Stories or anywhere else you like! The video feature is available for iPhone XR, XS and XS Max.

NEW! Neck Retouching
Retouch the neck area using this awesome new tool.

NEW! Eye and Nose Contouring
Use this simple tool to precisely contour facial features.

Improved Auto-correction
Auto-correction gets huge improvements with new AI-model for auto-adjustments. No more oversaturated results!

Introducing Video Retouching
Lensa now works with videos too! Retouch video selfies and share on Instagram Stories or anywhere else you like! The video feature is available for iPhone XR, XS and XS Max.

NEW! Neck Retouching
Retouch the neck area using this awesome new tool.

NEW! Eye and Nose Contouring
Use this simple tool to precisely contour facial features.

Improved Auto-correction
Auto-correction gets huge improvements with new AI-model for auto-adjustments. No more oversaturated results!

-New tool "grain", try it!
-Now the photos open much faster.
-Various bug fixes and improvements.

-New tool "grain", try it!
-Now the photos open much faster.
-Various bug fixes and improvements.

-New tools in the video mode teeth whitening and eye bags that will make your Stories even brighter;
-Various bug fixes and improvements;

-Selective Color new tool, which found to help change tone, look and feel your images.
-Various bug fixes and improvements.

-Dark mode support;
-Various bug fixes and improvements;

-New editor's design;
-Various bug fixes and improvements;

- New entertaining Background replacement option for your easy “travel” without standing up from the sofa. Try on the background tab!
-Various bug fixes and improvements;

You asked — here it is!
Upload any photo from your phone gallery and use it as background. Try it now on Background tab!
We added Crop & Rotate Tool. Now you can crop and rotate your photos using only one button. No need to pre-edit you photos in Photo Gallery, you can do it all in Lensa!
Ok, this is a big one: you can now upload videos from your iPhone and make your skin and smile look perfect! Not on every phone yet, but soon, stay tuned! ;-)
You can now change your hair color in your selfies! Wanna see what you will look like with different hair color? Do it in just a few seconds.
UPDATED = BETTER We've fixed some minor bugs and made some changes in the interface. For even smoother experience editing your photos.

What's New
This new improved version of Lensa works smoothly with iOS 14 and has some cool new features.
NEW! We have added a home screen widget. You can now add photos directly from your home screen.
IMPROVED PRIVACY SETTINGS
The process of adding photos to Lensa for editing has always been very secure. All the photos were being edited only on your device. We would never store or copy them because we strongly believe that your pictures belong to you and only you. To seal that deal in the latest version of the app we use Apple's native import that guarantees 100% control over the use of your photos.
Now you can control the power of one-tap Magic Correction. Meet our new Intensity tool. It allows you to decide how much Magic exactly you want to apply to your photo.
Now you can control the power of one-tap Magic Correction. Meet our new Intensity tool. It allows you to decide how much Magic exactly you want to apply to your photo.
VINTAGE LOOK! You can now add old-fashioned grain to your photos to give them that warm and misterious look. A whole of ten different textures available. Try it and post it immediately!

NEW TOOLS!
- Remove Background option for portraits and selfies. Now you can сreate a transparent background in photos and selfies.
- Auto white balance! You don't have to worry about weird colors or unnatural light in your photos anymore: Lensa will automatically adjust the white balance for you. No more of those photos that look too red or too blue, no more pale or yellow faces: Lensa will make your pictures look natural.

NEW VERSION = NEW FUN
Check out these cool tools that will make your photos and videos look more sophisticated and professional.

WHAT'S NEW
• Video Correction. Our signature features, Magic Correction and Auto Adjust now work with videos as well as with photos.
• Frames. Now your photos will look even more stylish. Play with colors and shapes to make your portraits and selfies truly stand out.
• Bokeh effect. Add blurred background lights to your photos to create the most romantiс pictures. To try it, go to the Background tab.

NEW VERSION = NEW FUN
Check out these cool tools that will make your photos and videos look more sophisticated and professional.

WHAT'S NEW
• Video Correction. Our signature features, Magic Correction and Auto Adjust now work with videos as well as with photos.
• Frames. Now your photos will look even more stylish. Play with colors and shapes to make your portraits and selfies truly stand out.
• Bokeh effect. Add blurred background lights to your photos to create the most romantiс pictures. To try it, go to the Background tab.

NEW FAQ SECTION! Lensa has always been very intuitive and easy to use. But if you want to explore its features further and learn some cool new tricks, check out the new FAQ section. Here, you will find the explanations of what every instrument can be used for and some tips about photo editing. If you still have any questions left, send us an email, and we'll add the answer to FAQ as well!
BETTER EVERY DAY This update includes just some minor fixes which will help Lensa run smoothly on your smartphone. Enjoy editing!

NEW FEATURE!
Now you can apply the edits you like (exposure, contrast, filters, etc.) to multiple photos at once. No need to edit every photo separately! Lensa now saves even more of your time. And hey, that will help to make your Instagram grid look perfect.

MINOR, BUT IMPORTANT FIXES
This version of Lensa runs a bit smoother. Happy editing!

NEW TOOL! We've added a handy Perspective tool to Lensa. You can now correct the angle from which the photo was taken, or straighten the lines, both vertically and horizontally. This tool can also help you eliminate distortions of the face or body in the picture.
BETTER EVERY DAY! This update includes just some minor fixes which will help Lensa run smoothly on your smartphone. Enjoy editing!

NEW FX EFFECTS!

Now you can add new (truly badass!) styles and textures to you photos in just one click! Film burn, grunge, retro, grain, and many others: you'll find them under the FX Effects tab.
FX Effects make your photos look trendy and stylish: don't be shy to use them!
MINOR, BUT IMPORTANT FIXES This version of Lensa runs a bit smoother. Happy editing!
MINOR, BUT IMPORTANT FIXES This version of Lensa runs a bit smoother. Happy editing!
MINOR, BUT IMPORTANT FIXES This version of Lensa runs a bit smoother. Happy editing!

NEW! Replica Tool analyzes the filters and presets in any photo, for example, in your favourite blogger's post, and then applies them to your selfie. How cool is that?! To do so, simply upload a screenshot of the photo, press the button — and voilá! No more need to go around asking people the name of that beautiful filter they've used.
